text: BB-8 is a robot character in the Star Wars franchise, first appearing in the 2015 movie Star Wars: The Force Awakens. It is a sphere-shaped robot with a free-moving domed head. BB-8 is portrayed by both a rod puppet and a remote- controlled robotic unit. It is similar to R2-D2. Its owner is Poe Dameron. It is voiced by Bill Hader. ==References== ==Other websites== * BB-8 in the Official StarWars.com Encyclopedia Category:Fictional characters introduced in 2015 Category:Star Wars characters
title: BB-8
